short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert from timezone to timezone without Googling

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save the hassle of googling the time using Timezonify's built-in timezone conversion feature. Simply open up the popup and choose a timezone you wish to convert the time into.
